Created an attachment (id=15458)
Eclipse preferenc file
Reproducible by the following steps:
- enable 'Close editors automatically' after 1 editor
- enable Print Margin
- open a Java file
- open another Java file, therefore reusing the editor
- disable Print Margin
-> exception

The attached preferences look like they belong to another application.
Fixed in builds >20041029
Sorry, that was my eclipse OptimizeIt preferences that I attached. That isn't
what I imported to reproduce the error though <g>
adapted target milestone
